source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SEQ_00<tab>The words of the Vanu shaman yet trouble Sidurgu...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SEQ_00<tab>Les paroles du chaman vanu vanu troublent Sidurgu.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SEQ_01<tab>Who better to tell you more of the “great spirit” than those who commune with spirits regularly? For that reason, Sidurgu hopes that the conjurers of Stillglade Fane can offer insight into Rielle's condition. He notes that the road to Gridania will offer many opportunities for the Temple Knights to attack. At the very least, you should be safe as far as Camp Dragonhead.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SEQ_01<tab>Sidurgu a décidé d'emmener Rielle à Gridania pour la faire ausculter par les élé<var 16 /var>men<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>lis<var 16 /var>tes. Allez les retrouver au camp de la Tête du dragon.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SEQ_02<tab>Suspecting that the Temple Knights are nearby, Sidurgu offers to scout out the road to the Observatorium. Stay with Rielle and follow him at a distance.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez retrouvé Sidurgu, qui a suggéré que vous vous sépariez. Pendant qu'il ouvre la route, escortez Rielle jusqu'à l'Observatoire.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SEQ_03<tab>Not long after you part ways, the Temple Knights attack, spurring you and Rielle to make haste to the Observatorium. Though the knights are no match for you, their numbers are legion, and you find yourself growing weary from the struggle. However, Rielle's conjury proves surprisingly potent, and you are able to fend off your attackers until you reach the safety of the Observatorium's walls.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SEQ_03<tab>Après avoir repoussé les attaques de nombreux templiers, vous avez finalement réussi à accompagner Rielle jusqu'à l'Observatoire. Allez retrouver Sidurgu.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SEQ_04<tab>Sidurgu chides himself for leaving your side and bids you make haste to Gridania, before the Temple Knights return with reinforcements. Seek out Brother E<var 1F /var>Sumi<var 1F /var>Yan at the Conjurers' Guild and beg his assistance.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SEQ_04<tab>Sidurgu a décidé que ce serait lui qui escorterait Rielle jusqu'à Gridania. Rendez-vous à la cité forestière et retrouvez-les au Temple de la Sérénité.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SEQ_05<tab>After a cursory examination, Brother E<var 1F /var>Sumi<var 1F /var>Yan states that the Vanu shaman spoke true, after a fashion. Rielle's innate spiritual presence does indeed bear similarities to that of the elementals─and the Dravanians. Citing an ancient legend in which a man ingested the blood of dragons to become one himself, he speculates that Rielle may have partaken of the blood of an ancient Dravanian. Though Sidurgu is unnerved by the implication, Rielle's feelings are unclear, her face an unreadable mask. Before you embark for Ishgard, Brother E<var 1F /var>Sumi<var 1F /var>Yan suggests you rest a while at the Carline Canopy.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SEQ_05<tab>Après avoir examiné Rielle, E-Sumi-Yan a émis l'hypothèse qu'elle ait ingéré du sang de dragon. Allez retrouver la jeune fille aux Feuilles de carline, où elle est partie se reposer.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SEQ_06<tab>Frustrated by her silence in the face of Brother E<var 1F /var>Sumi<var 1F /var>Yan's suggestions, Sidurgu presses Rielle for an explanation. She pauses, and then, with a faraway look in her eyes, she speaks softly of her imprisonment in a windowless cell, with walls so thick she could not even hear the rain. She denies drinking dragon blood, and claims that she was never accused of such. As for their reasons, she intones that her captors simply said, “it's better this way.” Uncertain how to respond, Sidurgu excuses himself and steps outside, leaving you to look after Rielle until she has finished eating.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SEQ_06<tab>Rielle s'est livrée à vous, racontant un peu plus en détail l'horreur qu'elle a vécue. Parlez-lui de nouveau lorsqu'elle aura fini de se reposer.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SEQ_07<tab>As you watch Rielle eat, you start to wonder how long she was kept in her cell, and how she passed the time in solitude. Afterwards, she thanks you for waiting and heads outside to find Sidurgu.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SEQ_07<tab>Il est temps de retourner à Ishgard. Allez retrouver Sidurgu devant les Feuilles de carline.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SEQ_08<tab>Eager to quit the forest, Sidurgu departs with Rielle. Return to the Forgotten Knight and speak with them there.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SEQ_08<tab>Sidurgu vous a assuré qu'il protégerait Rielle sur le chemin du retour. Mettez-vous en route et retrouvez-le au Chevalier oublié.

source:
TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SEQ_09<tab>Blessedly, you and Sidurgu meet with no trouble on the road back to Ishgard. Recognizing that he has yet to adequately recompense you for your services, he resolves to share what knowledge of the dark arts he has with you.

※The next dark knight quest will be available from Sidurgu upon reaching level 56.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SEQ_09<tab>Sidurgu semblait troublé par ce que vous avez appris à Gridania. Il vous a assuré qu'il continuerait à vous apprendre ses techniques de chevalier noir, même s'il pense être sur le point d'atteindre ses limites...
* Sidurgu propose la prochaine quête aux chevaliers noirs de niveau 56.

target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_TODO_00<tab>Retrouver Sidurgu au camp de la Tête du dragon

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_000<tab>So a “great spirit” dwells within Rielle, if that shaman is to be believed...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_000<tab>À en croire le chaman vanu vanu, Rielle serait habitée par un “esprit supérieur”...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_001<tab>We need answers, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and I can think of no one better to ask than those who commune with spirits regularly.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_001<tab>Nous avons besoin de réponses, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, et pour les trouver, je ne vois pas de meilleur moyen que de nous adresser à ceux qui communiquent avec le monde spirituel.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_002<tab>I speak of Gridania's conjurers, who can hear the voices of the Twelveswood─or so it is said.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_002<tab>Je pense bien sûr aux élé<var 16 /var>men<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>lis<var 16 /var>tes de Gridania, qui peuvent parler avec les esprits de la forêt de Sombrelinceul. Du moins, c'est ce qu'on dit.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_003<tab>It's just as well. Fray told me she had an aptitude for their arts. What had taken him moons to learn, she mastered in days.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_003<tab>En fait, ça tombe bien. Fray m'a toujours dit que Rielle avait un don pour cette discipline. Quand il lui fallait plusieurs lunes pour assimiler une technique, elle était capable de la maîtriser en quelques jours.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_004<tab>Sometimes these talents run in the family, he said. Mayhap her ancestors were conjurers after a fashion...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_004<tab>D'après lui, il arrive que ce genre de talent soit transmis dans les familles. Les ancêtres de Rielle étaient peut-être des élé<var 16 /var>men<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>lis<var 16 /var>tes, eux aussi...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_005<tab>Whatever the reason, there is no guarantee it is related to what the shaman said─or why the Temple Knights wish her dead.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_005<tab>Quoi qu'il en soit, rien ne nous dit que tout cela a un quelconque rapport avec ce que le chaman nous a dit, ou la raison pour laquelle les templiers veulent la voir morte.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_006<tab>If past experience is any indication, they will be tracking us the moment we leave the city. It's not a question of if they will attack us, but when...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_006<tab>Je suis sûr qu'ils vont se lancer à nos trousses dès que nous aurons quitté la cité. La question n'est pas de savoir s'ils vont ou non nous attaquer, mais quand...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_007<tab>But you will be ready for them, I see. Then let us be off. The road should be safe so far as Camp Dragonhead.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_007<tab>Enfin, je sais que tu seras prêt<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>, le moment venu. Retrouvons-nous au camp de la Tête du dragon, la route devrait être sûre jusque là-bas.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_010<tab>We must learn more of Rielle's condition. The conjurers of Gridania will surely have answers.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_010<tab>Il nous faut en apprendre davantage sur l'état de Rielle. Les élé<var 16 /var>men<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>lis<var 16 /var>tes de Gridania auront sûrement des choses à nous dire à ce sujet.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_015<tab>Are we going to see the conjurers? Fray used to tell me stories of the Fane.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_015<tab>Nous allons rencontrer les élé<var 16 /var>men<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>lis<var 16 /var>tes<var 1D /var>? Fray me racontait souvent des histoires fascinantes sur le Temple de la Sérénité.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_016<tab>...Sid said he would've won if they had let him keep his staff.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_016<tab>... Sid dit qu'il aurait gagné si on lui avait laissé son bâton, ce jour-là.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_020<tab>How much further is it to Gridania? I've never been...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_020<tab>On est encore loin de Gridania<var 1D /var>? Je n'y suis jamais allée...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_030<tab>They're close. I can feel it...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_030<tab>Ils sont proches, je le sens...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_031<tab>Stay with Rielle. I'm going to scout out the road to the Observatorium.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_031<tab>Reste avec Rielle. Je vais partir en recon<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce, on se retrouve à l'Observatoire.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_032<tab>Follow at a distance. If they come, do whatever it takes to see her safely inside the walls.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_032<tab>Je veux que vous restiez bien à distance, <var 08 E905 ((toutes)) ((tous)) /var> les deux. Si jamais vous vous faites attaquer malgré tout, fais ce qu'il faut pour qu'elle s'en sorte indemne.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_033<tab>Good. That's a promise.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_033<tab>Je compte sur toi.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_040<tab>Please be safe, Sid...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_040<tab>Sid...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_041<tab>...I'm ready, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Whenever you are.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_041<tab>Je suis prête, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_050<tab>You're not hurt, are you?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_050<tab>Vous... Vous n'êtes pas blessé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_060<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Thank the gods you're all right!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_060<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Dieux merci, tu vas bien<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_061<tab>Gaaah! I should have known they would strike when we were apart...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_061<tab>Grrr... J'aurais dû me douter qu'ils attaqueraient dès que nous serions séparés<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_062<tab>They're certain to return with reinforcements ere long. We must press on south, into Gridanian territory.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_062<tab>Ils vont sûrement revenir à la charge avec des renforts dans pas longtemps. Nous devons continuer à avancer vers le sud le plus vite possible.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_063<tab>Until we reach the city proper, we cannot be assured of safety.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_063<tab>Tant que nous ne serons pas arrivés à Gridania, nous ne serons pas en sécurité.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_064<tab>We leave now, Rielle. You can rest once we reach Stillglade Fane.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_064<tab>Il nous faut partir im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment, Rielle. Tu pourras te reposer au Temple de la Sérénité.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_070<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You are come to continue your studies?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_070<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Bonsoir)) ((Bonjour)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Bonjour)) ((Bonsoir)) /var>)) /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Êtes-vous venu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> pour continuer vos études<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_075<tab>Greetings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. How may I be of service?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_075<tab>Salutations, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Comment puis-je vous être utile<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_080<tab>...A “great spirit,” is it? If it please, I would examine this girl myself.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_080<tab>... Un “esprit supérieur”, vous dites<var 1D /var>? Si cela ne vous dérange pas, j'aimerais moi-même examiner cette jeune fille.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_081<tab>It is the very least I can do for one who has ever been a friend of the Twelveswood. Ah...but where are they?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_081<tab>C'est la moindre des choses que je puisse faire pour <var 08 E905 ((une amie)) ((un ami)) /var> de la Sylve <var 08 E905 ((telle)) ((tel)) /var> que vous. Mais au fait, où sont vos amis<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_082<tab>Apologies for our late arrival. Rielle grew tired, and I had to carry her part of the way.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_082<tab>Excusez-nous du retard. Rielle était fatiguée et j'ai dû la porter sur mes épaules sur une partie du chemin.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_083<tab>I could have kept walking...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_083<tab>J'aurais pu continuer à marcher...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_084<tab>Our burdens need not be our own, child. There is no shame in sharing the weight.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_084<tab>Il est inutile de porter ton fardeau toute seule, mon enfant. Il n'y a pas de honte à en partager le poids.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_085<tab>...Who's the boy?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_085<tab>... Qui est ce garçon<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_086<tab>Aha... I am Brother E<var 1F /var>Sumi<var 1F /var>Yan, master of this guild. And though you will labor to believe it, young man, I am several times your age.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_086<tab>E-Sumi-Yan, guide spirituel des élé<var 16 /var>men<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>lis<var 16 /var>tes gridaniens. Et même si cela peut vous paraître incroyable, jeune homme, j'ai plusieurs fois votre âge.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_087<tab>You must be Rielle. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has told me all about you.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_087<tab>Tu dois être Rielle. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> m'a parlé de toi.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_088<tab>Pray come closer and take your ease. I ask that you close your eyes and listen to my words.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_088<tab>Viens plus près, et mets-toi à l'aise. Tout ce que je te demande, c'est de fermer les yeux et de m'écouter at<var 16 /var>ten<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ve<var 16 /var>ment.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_089<tab>Breathe deep... Feel the myriad life around you... Be as one with the world...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_089<tab>Inspire pro<var 16 /var>fon<var 16 /var>dé<var 16 /var>ment... Tu dois ressentir les pulsations des innombrables énergies qui t'entourent... Ne faire qu'un avec le monde...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_090<tab>...Well?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_090<tab>... Alors<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_091<tab>Hmmm... The Vanu shaman spoke true, after a fashion.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_091<tab>... Le chaman vanu vanu a dit vrai.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_092<tab>Her spiritual presence belies her years...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_092<tab>Sa présence spirituelle est ex<var 16 /var>cep<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>nelle pour son âge...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_093<tab>It is clearly not the product of training, rather an innate power with which she radiates...akin to that of the elementals...or the Dravanians...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_093<tab>De toute évidence, ce n'est pas le fruit d'un en<var 16 /var>traî<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment ou d'une formation, mais plutôt un pouvoir inné qu'elle dégage... Quelque chose de semblable aux esprits... ou aux Dravaniens...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_094<tab>You can't be serious. She's just a girl!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_094<tab>Impossible<var 1D /var>! Ce n'est qu'une petite fille...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_095<tab>Yes, she is. A very special girl.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_095<tab>Oui. Une petite fille très spéciale...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_096<tab>Mayhap you are familiar with the tale of the Boy and the Dragon Gay?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_096<tab>Connaissez-vous le conte du petit garçon et du dragon<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_097<tab>...No.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_097<tab>... Non.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_098<tab>Hardly surprising. The archbishop declared it a heretic's tale, and with good cause. It is a corruption of an older legend in which a man partakes of dragon blood and, in so doing, becomes one himself.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_098<tab>Cela ne me surprend pas. L'Archevêque a décrété l'histoire hérétique, et ça se comprend. C'est l'adaptation d'une ancienne légende dans laquelle un homme boit du sang de dragon avant d'en devenir un lui-même.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_099<tab>Rumor has it that heretics hold such rituals for this very purpose... And if there is truth in such tales...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_099<tab>On raconte que les hérétiques organisent des rituels similaires dans le même but. Et si la légende est vraie...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_100<tab>Perchance she has ingested the blood of an ancient dragon?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_100<tab>Aurait-elle bu le sang d'un dragon, elle aussi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_101<tab>What!? She's not some half-crazed lunatic!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_101<tab>Quoi<var 1D /var>!? Rielle n'a rien à voir avec ces fous furieux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_102<tab>I make no accusations, only offer a possible explanation.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_102<tab>Loin de moi l'idée de la juger de quelque manière que ce soit. J'essaye seulement de trouver une explication.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_103<tab>Moreover, who is to say that she did so <var 1A 02 /var>knowingly<var 1A 01 /var>?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_103<tab>Qui plus est, même si c'est ce qui s'est vraiment passé, rien ne nous dit qu'elle l'a fait sciemment.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_104<tab>Y-You...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_104<tab>...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_105<tab>Excuse me, I...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_105<tab>Excusez-moi, je...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_106<tab>Ah, pray forgive me! I did not mean to cause you distress.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_106<tab>Pardonne-moi, je ne voulais pas te faire peur.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_107<tab>You have nothing to fear, my child, for you are in perfect health and blessed with two loyal guardians. Would that others could say the same!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_107<tab>Tu n'as rien à craindre, mon enfant. Tu es en parfaite santé et tu as la chance d'avoir deux protecteurs dévoués à tes côtés. Peu de gens peuvent se vanter d'avoir autant de chance<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_108<tab>I think Rielle would benefit from a brief respite before returning to Ishgard, unused to the rigors of the road as she is.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_108<tab>Je pense que Rielle devrait prendre un peu de repos avant de rentrer à Ishgard. Elle n'est pas habituée à voyager, et elle est déjà plutôt fatiguée.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_109<tab>Why not show her to the Carline Canopy? An eel pie can do wonders for the soul.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_109<tab>Que diriez-vous de faire une halte aux Feuilles de carline<var 1D /var>? Il n'y a rien de mieux que leur tarte à l'anguille maison pour vous requinquer.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_110<tab>...We thank you for your time.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_110<tab>... Merci d'avoir pris le temps de nous recevoir.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_120<tab>Such a gentle soul. I can see why he is so fond of her.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_ESUMIYAN_000_120<tab>Cet homme a un bon fond. Pas étonnant qu'il s'inquiète autant pour elle.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_125<tab>Hmph.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_125<tab>Pfff...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_130<tab>Bit premature, isn't it?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_130<tab>Rielle...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_140<tab>Faerie tales and fantasies!? This is what he has to offer us!?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_140<tab>Cet élé<var 16 /var>men<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>lis<var 16 /var>te n'a-t-il rien d'autre à nous offrir que ses contes de fées<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_141<tab>Heretics, I understand, but I expected better from the bloody head of the Conjurers' Guild!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_141<tab>Passe encore qu'il nous parle des hérétiques, mais j'attendais mieux du soi-disant guide des élé<var 16 /var>men<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>lis<var 16 /var>tes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_142<tab>And you─why didn't you speak up for yourself?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_142<tab>Et toi<var 1D /var>! Pourquoi tu n'as rien dit<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_143<tab>Rielle!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_143<tab>Rielle<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_144<tab>...There were no windows. Just walls of stone with little cracks to tempt your fingers, and iron bars colder than ice.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_144<tab>... Il n'y avait pas de fenêtre. Juste des murs de pierre lézardés par endroits et des barreaux plus froids que la glace.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_145<tab>I couldn't tell when it was raining─whether it was day or night...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_145<tab>Je ne savais même plus quel temps il faisait, ou même si c'était le jour ou la nuit...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_146<tab>She didn't say I drank blood. All she said was...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_146<tab>Elle n'a pas dit que j'avais bu du sang. Voilà les paroles qu'elle a prononcées...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_147<tab>“It's better this way.”
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_147<tab>“C'est mieux comme ça.”

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_148<tab>At least, if they catch me, they'll just kill me this time...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_148<tab>Au moins, je peux être sûre qu'ils me tueront im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment s'ils remettent la main sur moi...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_149<tab>...Can I finish my apple?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_149<tab>... Je peux finir ma pomme<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_150<tab>...Go ahead.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_150<tab>... Mange. Tu dois reprendre des forces.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_151<tab>...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_151<tab>...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_152<tab>...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_152<tab>...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_153<tab>...It's not a sin if someone made you do it.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_153<tab>... Ce n'est pas un péché si on t'y a forcée.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_154<tab>I didn't.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_154<tab>Je n'en ai pas bu...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_155<tab>I won't let them hurt you.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_155<tab>Ne t'inquiète pas, je ne les laisserai jamais te faire de mal.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_156<tab>...I know.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_156<tab>... Je sais.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_157<tab>...You want another one?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_157<tab>... Tu en veux une autre<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_158<tab>...No, thank you.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_158<tab>... Non merci.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_159<tab>...Right, then.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_159<tab>... Comme tu veux.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_160<tab>Keep an eye on her until she's finished eating, would you?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_160<tab>Garde un œil sur elle pendant qu'elle finit de se restaurer, d'accord<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_161<tab>I could do with some fresh air.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_161<tab>J'ai besoin de prendre un peu l'air.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_170<tab>Thank you for waiting with me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Shall we go and find Sid?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_170<tab>Merci de m'avoir attendue, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. On peut aller retrouver Sid, maintenant<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_180<tab>Do you need a moment?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_180<tab>Vous avez besoin d'un peu de temps<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_190<tab>Well, I've had my fill of the forest.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_190<tab>J'en ai ma claque de cette forêt.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_191<tab>Back to Ishgard, then. I think Rielle and I can manage on our own for now.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_191<tab>Retournons à Ishgard. Ne t'en fais pas pour Rielle, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, je m'occuperai d'elle sur la route.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_192<tab>Shall we?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_192<tab>On y va<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_200<tab>The apples were good, but maybe I should've tried the eel pie after all...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_000_200<tab>Les pommes étaient bonnes, mais je regrette de ne pas avoir essayé la tarte à l'anguille...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_210<tab>That was a blessedly uneventful journey. Mayhap the Temple Knights were still nursing the injuries you gave them.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_210<tab>Halone soit louée, le chemin du retour a été on ne peut plus tranquille. Les templiers devaient être en train de soigner leurs blessures après la raclée que tu leur as mise.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_211<tab>Rielle was worried they might try to ambush you on the road, but I assured her you would be fine...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_211<tab>Rielle craignait qu'ils te tendent un piège sur le chemin, mais je lui ai assuré que tu ne risquais rien.

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_212<tab>I must apologize, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. For all you have done for us, I fear I have yet to adequately recompense you.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_212<tab>J'aimerais m'excuser, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Tu as déjà tant fait pour nous, et je n'ai pas de quoi te remercier comme il le faudrait...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_213<tab>I will continue to share with you what skills I can. Alas, I fear we near the limits of my knowledge...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_SIDURGU_000_213<tab>Je vais continuer à partager avec toi mon expérience de chevalier noir. Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, je crains d'atteindre mes limites. Bientôt, il ne restera plus que les flammes, dans les ténèbres...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Escort Rielle to the Observatorium!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Escortez Rielle jusqu'à l'Observatoire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_BATTLETALK_01<tab>Let's go, then. I don't see anyone...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_BATTLETALK_01<tab>On dirait qu'il n'y a personne...

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_TEMPLEKNIGHT_BATTLETALK_01<tab>There they are! Summon the others!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_TEMPLEKNIGHT_BATTLETALK_01<tab>Les voilà<var 1D /var>! Appelle les autres<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_BATTLETALK_02<tab>They've found us!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_BATTLETALK_02<tab>Ils nous ont trouvé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>s<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_TEMPLEKNIGHT_BATTLETALK_02<tab>This way, men! After them!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_TEMPLEKNIGHT_BATTLETALK_02<tab>Par ici<var 1D /var>! Ne les laissez pas s'enfuir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_TEMPLEKNIGHT_BATTLETALK_03<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_TEMPLEKNIGHT_BATTLETALK_03<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_BATTLETALK_03<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_BATTLETALK_03<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_TEMPLEKNIGHT_BATTLETALK_04<tab>Surrender the girl! There's no escape!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_TEMPLEKNIGHT_BATTLETALK_04<tab>Il n'y a plus d'issue<var 1D /var>! Donne-nous la gamine<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_BATTLETALK_04<tab>Stay back, all of you!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_BATTLETALK_04<tab>Ne vous approchez pas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_TEMPLEKNIGHT_BOSS_BATTLETALK_01<tab>You are meddling in affairs beyond your ken!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_TEMPLEKNIGHT_BOSS_BATTLETALK_01<tab>Cette histoire ne te concerne pas, aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_BATTLETALK_05<tab>G-Get away from us! I'm warning you!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_BATTLETALK_05<tab>Laissez-nous tranquilles<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_TEMPLEKNIGHT_BOSS_BATTLETALK_02<tab>Gah! You'll live to regret this!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_TEMPLEKNIGHT_BOSS_BATTLETALK_02<tab>Grrr<var 1D /var>! Tu vas le regretter<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_BATTLETALK_06<tab>There are the gates, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Just a little further!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_BATTLETALK_06<tab>Encore un effort, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Je vois l'Observatoire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_BATTLETALK_07<tab>We... We made it! Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, thank you!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_BATTLETALK_07<tab>On a réussi<var 1D /var>! Merci, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, merci<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_BATTLETALK_08<tab>M-Mother, I...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK540_02061_RIELLE_BATTLETALK_08<tab>M-mère, je...
